Class EnemyBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Bullet
        • EnemyBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnyGroup, GroupB

    public class EnemyBullet
extends Bullet
implements GroupB
    This class represents the enemy bullets which are of GroupB. A collision between a bullet and an Object from GroupA (friendlies) will cause the bullet to vanish and a decrement by one of the other GroupA object.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Mossad Helali.

    • Method Detail

      • processCollision

        public void processCollision(GroupA gao)
        handles the collision between a GroupB (enemy) object and a GroupA (friendly) object. Any collision between two objects will result in a decrement by one health point to both objects. A dead object is an object whose health is zero.
        Specified by:
        processCollision in interface GroupB
        Parameters:
        gao - AnyGroup object whether it is friendly or enemy.
